channel.title: Testing German and Spanish localization
channel.description:
Help us verify the German and Spanish localization! Download the beta with support for these languages here:
https://testflight.apple.com/join/O2ebzEQq
If your device is not set to German or Spanish, you can open the Settings app and scroll down to the Auxy settings to change the default language.
Let us know in the comments if you find any errors or send an email to feedback@auxy.co.

item.title: Testing German and Spanish localization

item.description:

item.title: Testing German and Spanish localization
item.dc:creator: Auxy
item.description:
We have a professional translation firm helping out with additional translations and proofreading as well. Will eventually send out a new version with more languages to check.

item.title: Testing German and Spanish localization
item.dc:creator: joelgarcia
item.description:
as of right now, 108 people have opened the link, so I still think people do want to help

Read full topic

item.title: Testing German and Spanish localization
item.dc:creator: icelight
item.description:
Maybe people might be sending feedback to the email. But I have to say, I do feel like these kinds of situations illustrate the value of nurturing your community and maintaining really strong connections with your user base. Having effectively abandoned community development, it is a bit much to expect users to still be around to help you out on different things.

Read full topic

item.title: Testing German and Spanish localization
item.dc:creator: Auxy
item.description:
Help us verify the German and Spanish localization! Download the beta with support for these languages here:

testflight.apple.com

Join the Auxy Studio beta

Available on iOS

If your device is not set to German or Spanish, you can open the Settings app and scroll down to the Auxy settings to change the default language.

Let us know in the comments if you find any errors or send an email to feedback@auxy.co.
